title: 1011 Do This Exercise to Find Your Purpose
description:
On today's 5-minute Friday, we wanted to revisit a process Lewis learned from Dr. Ivan Joseph, a sports psychologist and high-performance coach. This exercise can help you identify what really matters to you, and then figure out how to chase it.

Listen to the full episode with Dr. Ivan Joseph: https://lewishowes.com/982
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
